a.span: BASD Planned Instruction and Voluntary Learning Opportunities
BASD Planned Instruction and Voluntary Learning Opportunities

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: As of April 13, BASD will transition our Continuity of Education plan from voluntary learning opportunities to teacher-directed planned instruction which is required.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: Below you will find the links to access the virtual learning sites of our district's teachers. These links are divided below by school (for the elementary level), by grade level (for the middle schools), or by subject matter (for the high school). If you have any questions, please reach out directly to your child's teacher(s) via email.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: Please also view our Continuity of Education webpage on our district website.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 28px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The Boyertown Area School District has made reasonable efforts to ensure that videoconferencing is confidential, and access is limited to students in the assigned groups. However, some of these services will be provided in a group format and when this occurs students will be able to see other students in the group. In addition, the Boyertown Area School District is unable to control who else may be in the room in which a student is receiving these services remotely, including other family members or others who are living with the other students, who may observe the session and what other students are in the group. Due to the nature of distance learning which may include Zoom meetings, Google Meet Hangouts, and other internet-based platforms, parents also acknowledge and agree that the District (although it will take precautions to try to do so) may not be able to ensure confidentiality per the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) and Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). Please see the links below for the Privacy Policies for both Zoom and GSuite.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: As a district, we will continue to house and provide voluntary virtual and/or unplugged learning activities to keep students meaningfully engaged if they desire or require further enrichment and review beyond their teacher-directed, planned instruction.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: At Home Learning Packets for grades K-5 can be found at this link: Paper Pencil Packets K-5.
